mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t1.`ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`EXTRA`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ` FROM `zt_action` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t2.realname AS `ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ` FROM `zt_action` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_user t2 on t1.actor = t2.account

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t2.`realname` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.`comment`, t1.extra, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner FROM `zt_action` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_user` t2 on t1.`actor` = t2.`account` WHERE ( t1.`OBJECTID` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} AND t1.`OBJECTTYPE` = #{srf.datacontext.objecttype} )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t2.`realname` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.extra, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner FROM `zt_action` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_user` t2 on t1.`actor` = t2.`account` WHERE ( t1.`PRODUCT` LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey},',%') )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t2.`realname` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`,t1.extra,case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner FROM `zt_action` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_user` t2 on t1.`actor` = t2.`account` WHERE ( t1.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t2.`realname` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.`comment`, t1.extra, (case when t1.actor = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} then 1 else 0 end) as ISACTORSS, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner FROM `zt_action` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_user` t2 on t1.`actor` = t2.`account` WHERE ( t1.`OBJECTID` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} AND t1.`OBJECTTYPE` = #{srf.datacontext.objecttype} )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t1.`ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`EXTRA`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ` FROM `zt_action` t1
